title: Filo-wrapped halibut fillets with lemon and spring onion sauce
ingredients: ['30g melted butter', '4 sheets filo pastry', '2 (140g) halibut fillets', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh dill', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '125ml double cream', '2 spring onions, finely chopped']
